nodes.beat: Dr. Steve, a Minecraft player, decides to create a mob unlike any other.
Steve collects resources and studies Redstone to create the mob.
Steve successfully creates the mob, naming it Frankenstein.
Frankenstein, confused and scared, escapes into the Minecraft world.
Steve, realizing the potential danger, sets out to find Frankenstein.
Steve encounters various Minecraft creatures and overcomes obstacles during his search.
Steve finally finds Frankenstein in a remote biome.
After a tough confrontation, Steve manages to tame Frankenstein.
Steve and Frankenstein return to their base and live peacefully.
Steve decides to create the mob using a rare and dangerous resource - the Nether Star.
Frankenstein, due to the Nether Star, starts causing chaos in the Minecraft world.
Steve, realizing his mistake, sets out to stop Frankenstein.
Steve battles various Nether creatures during his pursuit.
Steve confronts Frankenstein in the Nether and manages to neutralize the Nether Star.
Steve and Frankenstein return to the Overworld, learning a valuable lesson.
Dr. Steve, a Minecraft player, decides to create a mob to protect his village.
Frankenstein, unable to understand its purpose, leaves the village.
Steve, worried about his village's safety, sets out to bring Frankenstein back.
Steve faces various challenges and learns more about Minecraft's creatures and ecosystems.
Steve and Frankenstein return to the village and successfully defend it from a zombie siege.
Frankenstein, powered by the Nether Star, starts attracting dangerous mobs towards the village.
Steve, realizing his mistake, sets out to stop Frankenstein.
Steve faces numerous Nether creatures and endures harsh conditions in his pursuit.
Steve and Frankenstein return to the village and successfully defend it from the attracted mobs.
Steve decides to use Ender Pearls in the creation of the mob.
Frankenstein, due to the Ender Pearls, starts teleporting randomly across the Minecraft world.
Steve, realizing the potential danger, sets out to find and control Frankenstein.
Steve faces various challenges in the End dimension during his search.
Steve finds Frankenstein in the End and manages to control its teleportation.
Steve and Frankenstein return to their base and live peacefully.
Steve decides to use a Totem of Undying in the creation of the mob.
Frankenstein, due to the Totem of Undying, cannot be defeated by other mobs.
Steve, realizing the potential danger, sets out to find and control Frankenstein.
Steve faces various challenges in the Woodland Mansion during his search.
Steve finds Frankenstein and manages to control its invincibility.
Steve and Frankenstein return to their base and live peacefully.
Frankenstein, due to the Ender Pearls, starts teleporting and causing chaos in the village.
Steve, worried about his village's safety, sets out to bring Frankenstein back.
Steve faces various challenges in the End dimension during his search.
Steve and Frankenstein return to the village and successfully defend it from a zombie siege.
Frankenstein, powered by the Totem of Undying, starts attracting dangerous mobs towards the village.
Steve, realizing his mistake, sets out to stop Frankenstein.
Steve faces numerous challenges in the Woodland Mansion during his pursuit.
Steve and Frankenstein return to the village and successfully defend it from the attracted mobs.
